the practice, we must make our collaboration across geographies, skill sets, time zones and cultures even more effective. We will not give up on what makes us a great team - excellence in technology, straight talk, focus on results. But we will not stop there either – we’ll continue evolving and learning from our acquisitions, from new joiners, from our customers. And then people who joined us in a past few months will look back 5-10 years from now, tell their own stories of change, growth, opportunities and set new bold goals.”
